NAME.Nominative: Wednesday of the Third Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Wednesday of the Third Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 8<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: There is no spiritual essence of good works in us, O Lord, but merciful art Thou, O Lover of Mankind; disdain not the work of Thy hands, O Sinless One.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Sacrifice unto God a sacrifice of praise,
and pay unto the Most High thy vows.
SEXTE.STICHOS: The God of gods, the Lord, hath spoken, and He hath covered the earth.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 6<sup>th</sup> Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Have mercy on me, O God, according to Thy great mercy.
chant unto our King, chant ye.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Create in me a clean heart, O God.
